item.title: Changelog: 5 April 2024
item.description: • Add table of contents to my Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic and Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords mods.

item.title: I Received a Lifetime Premium Membership on Nexus Mods for Free
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New blog post.

In light of my mods hosted on Nexus Mods reaching 30,000 unique downloads, I was rewarded a free lifetime Premium membership on Nexus Mods.

item.title: Changelog: 7 February 2024
item.description: • My Creations: Added My Characters section.

item.title: Changelog: 9 January 2024
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Added a new section: My Contributions to the Cassette Beasts community.

item.title: Finally Beat A Bug's Life The Video Game — 24 Years Later
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New blog post.

My childhood goal of beating A Bug's Life video game was finally fulfilled.

item.title: I Can Finally Game on a Solid-State Drive
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New blog post.

I just got the solid-state drive (SSD) of my 5-year-old gaming laptop replaced with a new onw with a larger storage capacity, allowing me to install games on an SSD to enjoy the benefit of gaming on an SSD.

item.title: Changelog: 9 November 2023
item.description: • Added extra header elements to the main site and the shrines to be dynamically displayed on certain days to celebrate special events. (Credit to KotOR Community Portal for the inspiration)

item.title: Support for My Steam Review of A Summer's End — Hong Kong 1986
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New blog post.

A thank you post for the people who have supported my Steam review of A Summer's End — Hong Kong 1986.

item.title: Changelog: 18 October 2923
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Added Developer Notes section to the Trivia page.

item.title: My Cassette Beasts Pombomb Plushie Arrived!
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New blog post.

The official Cassette Beasts Pombomb plushie I purchased finally arrived.

item.title: Changelog: 4 Ocrober 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Updated the Development History section of the Trivia page with info about the release of Update 1.5 and "Pier of the Unknown" DLC.
